scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:next-steps
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:next-steps
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:next-steps
scripts.release:next-steps: git push --tags && GIT_TAG=`echo $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0)` && echo RELEASING $GIT_TAG && echo BUILDING HERE && npm run create-release-branch && npm run create-release-pr && npm run publish && npm run cleanup
scripts.create-release-pr:
git push origin HEAD && gh pr create --label release --title "Release $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0)" --body "**DONT SQUASH** 
 Lets release this beautiful code!"
